properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_INDATE, MEM_AGR, MEM_PIC, MEM_STATUS, MEM_OUTDATE, ROLE_ID, MEM_ACCESS, BLOCK_DATE, MEM_COOKIE, MEM_CATEGORY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_COOKIE = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_INDATE, MEM_AGR, MEM_PIC, MEM_STATUS, MEM_OUTDATE, ROLE_ID, MEM_ACCESS, BLOCK_DATE, MEM_COOKIE, MEM_CATEGORY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_COOKIE = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , MEM_GENDER , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_INDATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' , MEM_OUTDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICK = ?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NICK , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_GENDER , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_AGR , MEM_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
